remarks: An ortholattice is distributive in one ordering direction.  ( ~ ledi analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2011.)
statement:
latledi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latledi.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latledi.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latledi.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latledi $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) .\/ ( X ./\ Z ) ) .<_ ( X ./\ ( Y .\/ Z ) ) ) $.
